project.name: XApi - Dist Generator
project.description:
Contains a main and javac plugin designed to create "dist builds" in other modules.
A "dist" build will have had all classes visited, looking for magic methods to replace, as well as running other source-to-source transformations. The end result is a finalized artifact which should be capable of running as a standalone execution environment.
The two primary use cases for this are replacement of X_Inject calls with direct factory calls, and (eventually) a GWT.create replacement which might be able to preserve the existing gwt generator framework.
The lessons learned from making X_Inject replacement will be used to decide whether we can provide enough of the GWT generator APIs to be a replacement, or if we will need to consider other alternatives, like actually running the first half of the GWT 2 compiler chain, allowing generators to run, but then emitting java instead of javascript, to feed into J2CL.
